gaffer.function.simple.aggregate

Class Sum

  • java.lang.Object
    • gaffer.function.ConsumerFunction
      • gaffer.function.ConsumerProducerFunction
        • gaffer.function.AggregateFunction
          • gaffer.function.SimpleAggregateFunction<Number>
            • gaffer.function.simple.aggregate.NumericAggregateFunction
              • gaffer.function.simple.aggregate.Sum
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function, Cloneable

    public class Sum
extends NumericAggregateFunction
    An Min is a SimpleAggregateFunction that takes in Numbers of the same type and calculates the sum. If you know the type of number that will be used then this can be set by calling setMode(NumberType), otherwise it will be automatically set for you using the class of the first number passed in.
    See Also:
    NumericAggregateFunction
